item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @yogi11115 yogi11115
item.description:
@yogi11115 wrote:

ok guys i just want to get my script to either drop the ore or bring it to the bank heres my script it all works but i want it to drop the stuff or bring it to the bank someone plz tell me how pm to me or just reply in this forum thanks
program Autominer;
{.include Si.scar}

Var x,y :Integer;

Procedure minerocks;
Begin
Findcolor(x,y,7565691,274,166,515,340)
Mouse(x,y,1,1, true)
Wait(5000)
End;

Begin
repeat
minerocks;
until(false)
end.

Read full topic
